description: doc spec: link to the v,ok index idiom in the map section

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM (and in sync with arrays and slices). The change is minor, so if you like I can apply it myself. Let me know what you prefer. - gri http://codereview.appspot.com/4438067/diff/2002/doc/go_spec.html File doc/go_spec.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/4438067/diff/2002/doc/go_spec.html#newcode1158 doc/go_spec.html:1158: and may change during execution. Values may be added and removed s/Values/Elements/ http://codereview.appspot.com/4438067/diff/2002/doc/go_spec.html#newcode1159 doc/go_spec.html:1159: during execution using special forms of assignment. ...assignment; and they may be accessed with index expressions.

Sure, please do go ahead and apply it. mathieu On 2011/04/22 16:50:59, gri wrote: > LGTM > > (and in sync with arrays and slices). > > The change is minor, so if you like I can apply it myself. Let me know what you > prefer. > - gri > > http://codereview.appspot.com/4438067/diff/2002/doc/go_spec.html > File doc/go_spec.html (right): > > http://codereview.appspot.com/4438067/diff/2002/doc/go_spec.html#newcode1158 > doc/go_spec.html:1158: and may change during execution. Values may be added and > removed > s/Values/Elements/ > > http://codereview.appspot.com/4438067/diff/2002/doc/go_spec.html#newcode1159 > doc/go_spec.html:1159: during execution using special forms of href="#Assignments">assignment. > ...assignment; and they may be accessed with href="#Indexes">index expressions.

subject: code review 4438067: doc spec: link to the v,ok index idiom in the map section
